dashboard.description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented applications (Java, Spring Boot, Micronaut)

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])
topk(10, sum by(uri, method) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", job="$job", uri=~"$uri"}[1m])))
topk(10, sum by(uri, method) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_max{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", job="$job", uri=~"$uri"}[1m])))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", job="$job", uri=~"$uri", status!="200"}[$__interval])) / sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", job="$job", uri=~"$uri"}[$__interval])) * 100

dashboard.title: JVM (Micrometer) newest
